fxInfo_label: Occurrence of any type of popular vote this year credible
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: By credible, we mean whether the official results of the vote(s) reflect the actual vote(leaving aside issues of voter exclusion, intimidation, or vote-buying).
fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding by David Altman.
fxInfo_question: If any direct democracy election occurred this year, was the official result of the vote, or votes (their success or failure) credible?
name: v2ddcredal
